metadata.name: Artverse Bot!
metadata.description:
"GM, friend!  How can I help you?"  
  
---  
  
**Artist:**  Steve Walasavage  
**Series:**  Logos, Icons, and Mascots  
**Collection:**  Chromatic Editions  
**Edition:**  1/? NFT  
  
---  
  
*"Chromatic Editions"* is a collection of editions that showcase my artistic genius and absolute gifts when it comes to the digital arts (citation needed).  
  
All editions are ERC-1155 tokens minted on the [Chromatic Editions](https://etherscan.io/address/0x32D9A5Efa2E5d6876080B20F91d332539a7aA714) custom smart contract.

Extended Editorial License:  Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants.  The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder.  Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
